text: This is designed to be a central resource of services offering help at Harvard, with a focus on the physical and mental well-being of Harvard University students.

There are an extensive number of resources available to students across the University; for additional resources, please consult the

The ombudsman is an independent resource for problem resolution and works to ensure that all members of the University community are treated equitably and fairly. An ombudsman can provide confidential, informal assistance to help resolve issues related to the learning or workplace environment.
